product_name: CamelBak Podium Arc 4 Hydration Waist Belt - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Podium Arc 4 Hydration waist belt holds 4 Podium Arc bottles close at hand so you stay hydrated on race day. Waist belt includes four 8 fl. oz. bottles. Podium bottles feature the self-sealing JetValve(TM) caps that eliminate drips; JetValve caps let you sip from any direction or squirt to cool off on a hot day. Rip-and-stick closure with elastic webbing keeps bottles secure throughout the run. Zippered front pocket accommodates small items and energy snacks.
short_description: The CamelBak Podium Arc 4 Hydration waist belt holds 4 Podium Arc bottles close at hand so you stay hydrated on race day.
